name: Nameless Project (Mikumabu)
description:
This is a submit for the Wowie Jam 4.0

You are a warrior who can't attack and you are being followed by a guard trying to "catch" you but he's more like running around you protecting from enemies!

Heavily started by an AI running around you and finished like a Vampire Survivors type of game.

Controls

Arrows/WASD = Movement

Credits

Music: Ben Arntz (Fuse Retro Fusion Music Loops)

Sprites: LYASeeK (Minifolks Humans and Undead)

Tilemap: Raou (Lil' Dragon - Pixel Art Tileset)

Extra

There are some glitches I couldn't fix on time:

  1. The guard sprite glitches sometimes for a frame and positionates on another coordinate
  2. Some weird lines appears on the tiles
  3. Enemies spawn below the colliders, so it's a bit trickier to hit them
